text: You've successfully completed part 10, I really hope you enjoyed those strategies. Momentum strategies are absolutely wonderful, they can be particularly lucrative when the right conditions are there in the market. It's so crucial not only that you understand the strategies, but you understand and learn to develop those strategies within the right kind of context. Now that we're done with part 10, we're going to check that you understand the principles that we've dealt with throughout this part. So firstly, answer, why are the cash hours so important within the trading session? Then, why is a pre-open routine so imperative to the success of trading? And lastly, I want you to define momentum strategies in terms of the types of time frame plays you can expect to see, initiative versus responsive price action, time objective, the volume and volatility and the risk and reward. Remember guys, it's important to understand these various definitions, because if you understand that, you will be able to then add to your momentum playbook various types of momentum based strategies. Good luck.
